div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1948 S. Giorgio Morgeto, near Rosarno (910) (anc. Medma), Bruttium, 1914 Burial: c. 300 B.C. ? (K) Contents: AR A large hd., contents unknown, except for 2 st. (presumably Pegasi) of Ambracia Disposition: dispersed Putorti, NSc 1914, pp. 211-2
